title: PS I Love You XOXO Update
description:
What's the future of PS I Love You XOXO? Well...

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody welcome to your update on PS I Love You EXO EXO I'm your only host Greg Miller first and foremost thank you so much so many of you have reached out of course since Colin left talking about PS I love you wanting to know what's happening with it uh wanting it to go on in some shape or form uh I've held off on talking about it because I wanted to Center myself find out what I wanted to do with the show where kind of funny goes what's the right move for the company and I think we're on to it so it's good news bad news stick with me uh depending on where you Cal down PS I love you XOXO is going to end um I thought about it for a long time and you know when Colin announced he was leaving my first thought was we got to end this show right this show is Colin and I and so many of you reached out saying don't do it Colin himself said don't end it uh that in the same way that like I started Beyond this was an extension of that so continuing that on is an extension of that as
